column1: Figure 1. Total and sentenced prisoners under the jurisdiction of state or federal correctional authorities, 2012–2022
Report title: Prisoners in 2022 – Statistical Tables   NCJ 307149
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 2012–2022
Authors: E. Ann Carson, PhD, former BJS Statistician; and Rich Kluckow, DSW, BJS Statistician
Figure 1. Total and sentenced prisoners under the jurisdiction of state or federal correctional authorities, 2012–2022

Note: Jurisdiction refers to the legal authority of state or federal correctional officials over a prisoner, regardless of where the prisoner is held. Counts are for December 31 of each year and are based on prisoners with any sentence status (total) and those sentenced to more than one year (sentenced). See Tables 1 and 3 for counts.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 2012–2022.
